author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a testing code to study HGCalNeighbour for HGCal silicon cells

#### PR validation:

To be used to test the performance of HGCalNeighbour for the V19 geometry of HGCal

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx365J Add a testing code to study HGCalNeighbour for HGCal silicon cells
